name: Pop Journey
description:
Pop Journey
starting point of the game is loveliness and peace. Enjoy peace of mind while playing.

Ever changing Meidu


View outside the window
Looking at the scenery outside the window calms the upset mood


GAMEPLAY
Pop Journey is a level-based puzzle game, where you need to complete the goals of each level to progress within the game.

  • Tap two or more cubes of the same color to blast them and help complete the goals.
  • Combine a number of cubes to create powerful boosters such as the rocket, bomb and color bomb to clear the obstacles and reach the level goal.
  • You can also combine these boosters for bigger combos and blast your way to success!
  • You have a limited number of moves for each level, so plan each move accordingly.

FEATURES
  • Enjoy the scenery of the journey
  • Help Meidu change clothes
  • Challenging match-3 game
  • Find the gold coins hidden in the carriage
